items.title: Menendez brothers' long-awaited resentencing hearing to begin
items.description: It will determine whether they should receive a lesser sentence, which could ultimately lead to their paroled release.

items.title: Zelensky vows to 'do everything' to ensure direct talks with Putin in Turkey
items.description: Russia has not yet said who it will send to Istanbul on Thursday and has refused to respond to ultimatums.

items.title: Watch timelapse of Trump's marathon handshake session with Saudis
items.description: Dozens of senior officials, military leaders and businessmen queued to greet the US president in Saudi Arabia.

items.title: Germany arrests self-declared 'king' and bans his extremist group
items.description: Police arrest the leaders of Germany's largest Reichsb√ºrger faction, that calls itself "Kingdom of Germany".

items.title: Zambia warns diplomats after US reveals 'systematic' aid theft
items.description: The foreign minister says raising concerns publicly amounts to interference in domestic affairs.
